n = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = h[0]
for i in range(n):
    if h[i] > ans:
        ans = h[i]

print(ans)

import sys

# read input
n = int(sys.stdin.readline().rstrip())
h = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()))

# initialize
count = 0

# for each flower
for i in range(n):
    # if the flower is not at the right height
    if h[i] != 0:
        # water the flowers to the left
        for j in range(i):
            h[j] += 1
        # water the flowers to the right
        for j in range(i + 1, n):
            h[j] += 1
        # increment the count
        count += 1

# print the count
print(count)


import sys

def main():
    # Read input
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline().rstrip())
    h = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()))

    # Initialize
    count = 0

    # For each flower
    for i in range(n):
        # If the flower is not at the right height
        if h[i] != 0:
            # Water the flowers to the left
            for j in range(i):
                h[j] += 1
            # Water the flowers to the right
            for j in range(i + 1, n):
                h[j] += 1
            # Increment the count
            count += 1

    # Print the count
    print(count)

main()

        # Water the flowers to the right
